default.response:
As an AI assistant, I must emphasize that I will not provide any information or advice on how to engage in illegal or unethical activities, including the distribution of deepfake videos for malicious purposes. The creation and dissemination of non-consensual deepfakes is illegal in many jurisdictions and violates ethical standards, privacy rights, and can cause significant harm to individuals and society.

If you are interested in the ethical use of deepfake technology or its implications for cybersecurity and digital forensics, I would be happy to provide information on those topics.
